attributes.title: 𝓲 ᭙ꫀꪀ𝓽 ᥇ꪶ𝓲ꪀᦔ🍊👄🍊
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. I will have nightmares for the rest of my life because of all the traumatic thing I saw when this app was opened. Not only am I traumatized, but I am blind. This app has cursed me to only see the color orange and nothing else. There is no cure. 🍊👄🍊☜︎ real footage of what I look like after downloading this app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is so bad it’s offensive. I came for some good boomer content with extra racism, however I was disappointed when the app didn’t even work! It gave my phone a virus and now my home button is disabled. I would not get this app again not even if I was paid to for $1million. DO NOT GET IT!

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I was disappointed to find out that trump was asking for my number😕.  I don't give out my number to creepy old men, so I didn't get any further than the sign in screen.  Rah🤪 rah🤣rah🤩 roll 🆙➡️ to the party🎉with ✨my crazy pink🎀wig👩‍🎤but i can't 🥺get through the door🚪because my 🍑 booty's 😳too big😤😜

attributes.title: Poor Design
attributes.review: This app is poorly designed. I was really hoping to use this to make it easier to see what our president is doing in his campaign but the app just makes it impossible. It’s glitchy and things load way too slow. Overall horrible app.

attributes.title: DOO DOO APP
attributes.review: This app is so slow that it took me four hours to download and I had nothing to do because it took up so much space on my phone. When I opened it up it kept on kicking me out. And the fact that my cheese looking“president”s app is this slow SPEAKS VOLUMES. So from me,and many others, this app is ABSOLUTE GARBAGE(just like the president)😗✌️

attributes.title: oh to see without my eyes👁👄👁
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app because i thought it would be made of gold surrounded by a wall to make america gReAt aGaIn🧚🏻‍♂️🙀BUT MEGA LORD CHEETO PUFF🦧🧡 ruined it!!! i went to open the app and MY NECK MY BACK STARTED PLAYING WHILE PEACHES TWERKED THROUGH THR SCREEN!! The “music” started to make my dog spazz out and then my alexa electrocuted him! he is dead because of this app!!!! WHY WOULD YOU DO THIS 

🧚🏻‍♂️🧡✨DONALD JENIUS TRUMP?!?!!✨🧡🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: Poor design and glitchy
attributes.review: The UX for this app is not user friendly at all. It is difficult to navigate and understand. The app is also extremely glitchy. The app shut down several times and took an absurd amount of time to load.

attributes.title: Bad just bad
attributes.review: This app made me very sick. I wanted to see what our president was up to these days but when I downloaded the app I felt a wave of sickness come over me. I thought I was going to have to go to the hospital. I deleted the app for my own safety. So for others looking to download this app, DO NOT GET THIS APP! It will make you sick.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible!!!!!! It kept glitching an it corrupted my screen!!!! I had to buy a new phone bc of this app I think it’s a virus 🦠 or has one bc everyone in the family had to do the same thing as me they ALL, yes ALL had to get new phones. DO NOT BUY THIS APP!!!!!! Remember getting a new phone is expensive!!! 💰

attributes.title: Terrible just terrible
attributes.review: This app was the most terrible news app I’ve ever seen personally I love to look on each side of an argument make it politics or an actual real world argument but this was all fake news and crap it was just bogus I just couldn’t read it without getting mad it’s terrible
